content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much were you thinking of paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your kind offer, Herr Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair and reasonable price for this apartment. Could we start with 600 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euro per month is much lower than what I'm expecting for this prime location. The apartment is brand new, spacious, and in the heart of the city center. I believe a price closer to 900 Euro per month would be more reflective of its value. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your apartment does indeed have many desirable features. However, I'm a student, and I'm looking to manage my expenses wisely. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle? How about 750 Euro per month? This would still reflect the value of the apartment while being more in line with what I can afford.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your situation as a student. However, I must be honest with you. 750 Euro per month is still below my expectations. This apartment is quite luxurious and offers a high standard of living. I believe a price of 850 Euro per month would be a fair compromise. What is your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your offer of 850 Euro per month is quite generous, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. I must consider my budget carefully. Could we perhaps negotiate a few additional amenities to complement the price? For example, could you offer a few months of free utilities or a parking space? This would greatly assist me in managing my expenses.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I'm sorry, but I cannot offer any additional amenities at this time. The price of 850 Euro per month is already a significant discount from my original asking price. I believe this is a very fair offer, considering the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to pay 850 Euro per month, or do you have a lower offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I understand your position, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Your offer of 850 Euro per month for this apartment is indeed fair, considering its location and amenities. I would be willing to pay 850 Euro per month, as it aligns well with my budget and the value of the apartment. I look forward to living in such a wonderful space. Thank you for your time and effort in reaching this agreement.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I'm glad to hear that you find the apartment suitable and appreciate the value it offers. Indeed, 850 Euro per month is a fair price for both parties. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Would you like to sign a lease agreement now, or do you need more time to consider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I'm ready to sign a lease agreement now. This apartment is exactly what I'm looking for, and I'm thrilled to have found it. Thank you for your hospitality and for working with me on the price. I'm excited to make this my new home.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful, Maryam! I'm delighted to have you as a tenant. Let's proceed with the lease agreement. Please take a moment to review the terms and conditions, and once you're ready, we can sign it together. Welcome to your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I'm looking forward to living here and being a part of this community. The lease agreement looks fair, and I'm happy to sign it. Here's my signature. Thank you once again for everything.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent, Maryam. I'm pleased to have you as a tenant. Once you've moved in, if there's anything you need or if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I will definitely make the most of this wonderful apartment. I'm looking forward to a long and happy stay here. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
